channel.title: Check Out the Latest News from the World of Rock and Metal on Fandoming
channel.description: Recent content in Check Out the Latest News from the World of Rock and Metal on Fandoming

item.title: Rockstar Ends 2024 Strong with Red Dead Redemption PC Release
item.description: Red Dead Redemption is finally getting a fully optimized PC port on October 29, 2024, ending a 14-year wait.

item.title: Resident Evil Ends Five-Year Streak with No New Game in 2024
item.description: No new Resident Evil game in 2024, ending a five-year streak of annual releases.

item.title: New Silent Hill 2 Theory Reveals Dark Truth About Save Mechanic
item.description: Fan theory suggests red save squares in Silent Hill 2 Remake capture James’ soul.

item.title: Blizzard's Overwatch 2 Mobile Project Sparks Fan Backlash
item.description: Blizzard is reportedly developing an Overwatch 2 mobile version, but the project hasn’t been officially confirmed.

item.title: World of Warcraft Delays Cataclysm Classic's Final Patch
item.description: Hour of Twilight final patch for WoW: Cataclysm Classic delayed beyond January 2025.

item.title: FBC: Firebreak - A Supernatural Co-op Shooter from the Makers of Control
item.description: FBC: Firebreak is a co-op multiplayer game set in the Control universe, focusing on teams battling paranormal threats.

item.title: Banjo-Tooie Coming to Nintendo Switch Online Expansion Pack
item.description: Banjo-Tooie is coming to Nintendo Switch Online on October 25, 2024 as part of the Expansion Pack.

item.title: Alan Wake 2 Expansion: The Lake House Arrives October 22
item.description: The Lake House DLC for Alan Wake 2 launches on October 22, alongside physical editions of the game.

item.title: Halloween Gaming Sale: Save Up to 90% on Popular Titles
item.description: Up to 90% off on popular games like Resident Evil 4 Remake and Alien: Isolation across PS5, PS4, Xbox, and Steam.

item.title: Nintendo 64 Returns in 2025 with Analogue 3D Upgrade
item.description: Analogue 3D: A new version of the Nintendo 64 launching in 2025, with 4K, Bluetooth, and Internet support.

item.title: GTA 6 Online Might Feature Interactive Prisons and Player Factions
item.description: Prison system in GTA 6 Online could add new layers of gameplay, including bribery, jailbreaks, and in-prison tasks.

item.title: 2025’s Open World Games: Can Any Challenge GTA 6?
item.description: GTA 6 expected to dominate 2025 despite strong competition from other open-world games.

item.title: Stellar Blade Fan Creates Eye-Catching Custom DualSense Controller
item.description: Fan creates a custom DualSense controller inspired by Eve’s suit from Stellar Blade, impressing the PlayStation community.

item.title: EA Sports FC 25 Update Brings AI and Passing Fixes; See Details
item.description: First Time Lobbed Through Passes and driven passes nerfed for better balance.

item.title: Dr Disrespect Slams Kick After $50 Million Offer Rejected
item.description: Dr Disrespect fires back after Kick’s co-founder calls signing him a “waste of money.

item.title: Asmongold Resigns from OTK and Starforge Systems Amid Twitch Ban
item.description: Asmongold steps down from OTK and Starforge Systems following controversial comments about the Israel-Hamas conflict.

item.title: Game Freak Hit by Major Leak: New Pokémon Game Details Emerge
item.description: A multiplayer-focused Pokémon game leak reveals potential collaboration between Game Freak and ILCA.

item.title: Pokémon TCG Pocket to Launch October 30 with Digital Card Collection
item.description: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket launches on October 30 for Android and iOS.

item.title: Season 13 of Overwatch 2 Arrives October 15 With Halloween Vibes
item.description: Season 13 drops October 15 with dark magic and Halloween-themed content.

item.title: Is GTA 6 Delayed? Rumors Point to 2026 Release Window
item.description: Rumor claims GTA 6 has been delayed to early/mid-2026, with PC release 12-18 months after consoles.

item.title: Get Hands-On With Super Mario Party Jamboree Before Launch
item.description: Super Mario Party Jamboree demo kiosks are now available at Target, Best Buy, and GameStop.

item.title: Classic Weapons Make Their Way to Modern WoW During 20th Anniversary
item.description: Epic weapons from WoW Classic Season of Discovery are coming to modern WoW during the 20th-anniversary event.

item.title: Virtua Fighter 6 Might Be in the Works, Say Insiders
item.description: Let’s rewind to Virtua Fighter, a game that basically dragged the fighting genre into the 3D era, kicking and screaming.

item.title: Nintendo Teases New Feature for Switch Online Users
item.description: Nintendo just dropped a bomb on us, teasing a new Nintendo Switch Online feature with almost zero details.

item.title: Fan Theory Confirmed in Silent Hill 2 Remake: Mary’s Body
item.description: Mary’s body confirmed to be in James’ car in the Silent Hill 2 Remake.

item.title: Super Mario Party Jamboree ROM Leaked Before Launch
item.description: Super Mario Party Jamboree leaked online just a week before its official release on October 17.

item.title: Stellar Blade Developer Sued for Copyright Infringement
item.description: Shift Up, the developer of Stellar Blade, is being sued for copyright infringement by a small Louisiana-based film company.

item.title: Darksiders 2: Deathinitive Edition Coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X|S
item.description: Darksiders 2: Deathinitive Edition arrives on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S on October 15th.
